nodes.title: The browser Vivaldi https://t.co/W1cVtRwF4V , I think it's the best one for me. I created several workspaces, separated sessions, so I can switch the workspace for different purpose, work, home, anonymous, project. I also like the features like sidebar panels, custom bookmark bar https://t.co/zAQy0bMeTC
nodes.author: Owen Young

nodes.title: After trying many self-hosted chat server solutions(e.g. Matrix,Rocket chat, mattermost) and some p2p chat apps,, I choose Mattermost, it's the only solution that worked at a local network, though it's not friendly to encrypted messages, my need is for LAN chat, so it's not bad.

nodes.title: Just found @slowlyapp , a penpal social community, simulate a real post service, send a letter will delay several hours, determined by the distance. Now I have 3 penpals, one of them, I send a letter will take 55 hours!  https://t.co/yR0gatEpkb

nodes.title: Today I learned: Wikipedia is not the only service that the Wikimedia group provides, and the surprise is  Wikivoyage, it's a really good place to explore the city you want to travel. https://t.co/AoML7EeXCB
